reset_browser_script:
@echo off
chcp 65001 >nul
title DAT LAI TRINH DUYET (FACTORY RESET)
set userName=%USERNAME%
set currentDateTime=%date:~-4,4%-%date:~-10,2%-%date:~-7,2%_%time:~0,2%h%time:~3,2%m
set pcName=%COMPUTERNAME%
set logFileName=%TEMP%\ResetBrowser_%userName%.txt

echo [LOG] Bat dau RESET tren %pcName% - %currentDateTime% > "%logFileName%"

:: 1. KILL PROCESS
taskkill /f /im chrome.exe >nul 2>&1
taskkill /f /im msedge.exe >nul 2>&1
taskkill /f /im firefox.exe >nul 2>&1

:: 2. CHROME (XOA SACH USER DATA)
echo [Chrome] Dang Reset...
if EXIST "%LOCALAPPDATA%\Google\Chrome\User Data" (
    rmdir /s /q "%LOCALAPPDATA%\Google\Chrome\User Data"
    echo [Chrome] Da xoa Profile cu >> "%logFileName%"
)

:: 3. EDGE (XOA SACH USER DATA)
echo [Edge] Dang Reset...
if EXIST "%LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Edge\User Data" (
    rmdir /s /q "%LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Edge\User Data"
    echo [Edge] Da xoa Profile cu >> "%logFileName%"
)

:: 4. FIREFOX (TAO PROFILE STB)
echo [Firefox] Dang xu ly Profile...
set FIREFOX_PATH="C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe"
set FIREFOX_PATH_X86="C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe"

if not exist %FIREFOX_PATH% (
    if exist %FIREFOX_PATH_X86% (
        set FIREFOX_PATH=%FIREFOX_PATH_X86%
    ) else (
        echo [Firefox] Khong tim thay file chay >> "%logFileName%"
        goto END_FF
    )
)

:: Xoa profile cu
if EXIST "%APPDATA%\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles" (
    rmdir /s /q "%APPDATA%\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles"
    echo [Firefox] Da xoa Profile cu >> "%logFileName%"
)

:: Tao profile STB moi
setlocal EnableDelayedExpansion
set "CHARS=0123456789"
set "RANDOM_NUMBERS="
for /l %%i in (1,1,4) do (
    set /a INDEX=!random! %% 10
    for /f %%c in ("!INDEX!") do set "RANDOM_NUMBERS=!RANDOM_NUMBERS!!CHARS:~%%c,1!"
)
set "PROFILE_NAME=ThucIT!RANDOM_NUMBERS!"

%FIREFOX_PATH% -P -CreateProfile "!PROFILE_NAME!" "%APPDATA%\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\!PROFILE_NAME!"
if %errorlevel% == 0 (
    echo [Firefox] Tao profile "!PROFILE_NAME!" THANH CONG >> "%logFileName%"
    %FIREFOX_PATH% -ProfileManager -setDefaultProfile "!PROFILE_NAME!"
    echo [INFO] Firefox Profile: !PROFILE_NAME!
)

:END_FF
echo.
echo ==========================================
echo    DA HOAN TAT RESET TRINH DUYET
echo ==========================================
echo Nhat ky: %logFileName%
echo.
echo Vui long mo lai trinh duyet de kiem tra.
pause
